title: Facundo Cordero
text: Facundo Cordero (born 31 July 1998 in <a href="Argentina">Argentina</a>) is an <a href="Argentine">Argentine</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who plays for the in <a href="Premiership%20Rugby">Premiership Rugby</a>. His playing position is <a href="Wing%20%28rugby%20union%29">wing</a> or <a href="Fullback%20%28rugby%20union%29">fullback</a>. He joined the Exeter Chiefs in July 2020, having previously played in his home land for in the <a href="2019%20Currie%20Cup%20First%20Division">2019 Currie Cup First Division</a> and <a href="Ceibos">Ceibos</a> in the first <a href="2020%20S%C3%BAper%20Liga%20Americana%20de%20Rugby%20season">Súper Liga Americana de Rugby season</a>. He also represented <a href="Argentina%20XV%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Argentina XV</a> ten times between 2017 and 2019. His performances for the Chiefs saw him named in the <a href="Argentina%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Argentina</a> squad for the 2021 internationals. He is the brother of fellow Argentine international <a href="Santiago%20Cordero">Santiago Cordero</a>.
